channel.title: Posts on The Capable Snakekeeper and all his wrongdoings
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Capable Snakekeeper and all his wrongdoings

item.title: "Meshing Around"
item.description: Dynamic Adaptive Tessellation using D3D12 Mesh & Amplification Shaders.

item.title: Realtime Terrain Erosion Tool
item.description: Realtime physically accurate erosion simulation for interactive terrain authoring using compute shaders in WebGPU.

item.title: ðŸ“€AlgebRaveðŸ“€
item.description: Audioreactive & Interactive Graphics experience for Kinect - play any song from Spotify, and see the background and your silhoutte dance to the beats of the music of your choice!

item.title: Vulkan Grass Rendering
item.description: Reactive foliage (grass blades) using Tessellation & Compute Shaders in Vulkan with dynamic LODs and Frustum, Distance, View Culling.

item.title: Stylization with Shader Graphs
item.description: Stylized realtime render of Spider Punk made using Unity’s shader graphs.

item.title: Hi Ember!
item.description: Ember from Pixar’s Elemental created entirely procedurally! Tons of noise, toolbox functions, and basic shader art.

item.title: CUDA Boids
item.description: A GPU implementation of Craig Reynolds’ model of flocking for boids using C++ and CUDA.

item.title: SDF-based PBR Pokeballs
item.description: Pokeballs made using Signed Distance Fields, implementing realtime PBR, Environment Mapping, Raymarching & Subsurface Scattering.

item.title: WandaVision themed Minecraft
item.description: Procedurally generated Minecrat terrain with post-process effects matching the theme of my favourite Marvel TV show, WandaVision.
